function.name: tsatp
function.description: Calculates saturated temperature [K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: psatt
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [MPa] as a function of temperature, T [K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: tcrit
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: ttrip
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: pcrit
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [MPa] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: ptrip
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [MPa] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: t23
function.description: Calculates Temperature [K] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: p23
function.description: Calculates Pressure [MPa] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of temperature, T [K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: vtp
function.description: Calculates the specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: rhotp
function.description: Calculates the mass density [kg/m³] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: htp
function.description: Calculates the mass enthalpy [kJ/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: utp
function.description: Calculates the mass internal energy [kJ/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: stp
function.description: Calculates the mass entropy [kJ/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cptp
function.description: Calculates the isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cvtp
function.description: Calculates the isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: wtp
function.description: Calculates the speed of sound [m/s] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: vf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: vg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: rhof
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid density [kg/m³] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: rhog
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor density [kg/m³] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: hf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid enthalpy [kJ/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: hg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor enthalpy [kJ/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: uf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid internal energy [kJ/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: ug
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor internal energy [kJ/kg] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: sf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid entropy [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: sg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor entropy [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cpf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cpg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor isobaric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cvf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: cvg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor isochoric specific heat [kJ/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: wf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid speed of sound [m/s] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: wg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor speed of sound [m/s] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: mutp
function.description: Calculates the viscosity [μPa-s] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: muf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid viscosity [μPa-s] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: mug
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor viscosity [μPa-s] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: ktp
function.description: Calculates the thermal conductivity [kW/m-K] as a function of T [K] and p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: kf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid thermal conductivity [kW/m-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: kg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor thermal conductivity [kW/m-K] as a function of pressure, p [MPa].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: sigma
function.description: Calculates the surface tension [N/m] as a function of temperature, T [K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: tph
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of p [MPa] and mass enthalpy, h, [kJ/kg].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: tps
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of p [MPa] and mass entropy, s, [kJ/kg-K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: ths
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of mass enthalpy, h [kJ/kg], and mass entropy, s [kJ/kg-K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: phs
function.description: Calculates the pressure, p [MPa], as a function of mass enthalpy, h [kJ/kg], and mass entropy, s [kJ/kg-K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: getvers
function.description: Returns the version of the IF97 implementation code. Takes a "dummy" parameter that can be (0).

function.name: xph
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and mass enthalpy, h [kJ/kg].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: xps
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and mass entropy, s [kJ/kg-K].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: xpu
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and mass internal energy, u [kJ/kg].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: xpv
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and specific volume, v [m³/kg].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: xprho
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and mass density, ρ [kg/m³].\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: hpx
function.description: Returns the mass enthalpy, h [kJ/kg], as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: spx
function.description: Returns the mass entropy, s [kJ/kg-K], as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: upx
function.description: Returns the mass internal engergy, u [kJ/kg], as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: vpx
function.description: Returns the specific volume, v [m³/kg], as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.

function.name: rhopx
function.description: Returns the mass density, rho [kg/m³], as a function of pressure, p [MPa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.\nNOTE: Provide parameters without Mathcad units attached, but scaled to the units specified here.
